analysis: The project requires an Egyptian-themed UI with light desert colors and mobile responsiveness. The current files need updates to incorporate Egyptian patterns, a cohesive color scheme, and improved mobile navigation.

improvements.description: Update CSS to include Egyptian-themed patterns using SVG data URLs and apply a light desert color palette with warm tones like sandy beige, soft gold, and light brown.
Enhance the HTML structure to include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon and ensure semantic HTML for better accessibility and SEO.
Fix the syntax error by removing the word 'pełni' and re-implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
